messages.subject: CAS meeting
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Debbi Thats for asking is was on Monday and I had sent the kids to a friends house and only had the 12yo here so they were not happy but I told them I will
messages.messageBody:
Hi Debbi
Thats for asking is was on Monday and I had sent the kids to a
friends house and only had the 12yo here so they were not happy but I
told them I will not put the little ones through seeing that lady
again. Even though they were not here they heard me say she was
coming and that is why I had to leave them somewhere else and the 3
yo did not want to come back home she was scared. Anyway they needed
to set up a meeting for Monday the 17th for the new lady Tania to
meet them with out the first people there. I am trying to find
someone to be with them when she questions them because I will not
let them do that again. It was amazing how many more lies came out at
that meeting they are now trying to say that I make even my 9 and 12
year olds go for naps for 3-5hours every day and that I do not do
anything that is a mothers reponsibly that I make my kids do it and
so on. And my 5yo go a toy guitar and hit the 3yo in the eye and gave
her a black eye I do not think it will be gone by Monday and I can
just imagine what they will say about that. They still have not gave
me anything in writing but say they will be doing several surprise
and set-up meetings. I want to take them to court to stop this
because everyone including us say this is unjustified.
Thanks for listening
Jackie
